summary:
Running Ollama in a containerized environment.

Storage location: "containerized_chatgpt_agent/startup_ollama_service.sh":3-5
Code:
```
docker exec -it ollama bash
# usage: https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/dockerexec/#docker-exec--it
```
Comment for code:
Starting an interactive shell within the Ollama container.

Storage location: "containerized_chatgpt_agent/startup_ollama_service.sh":6-7
Code:
```
source /root/.ollama/bin/activate && \
ollama-admin create --name <CHATGPT_AGENT_NAME> --email <CHATGPT_AGENT_EMAIL>
# usage: https://ollama.ai/docs/administration-guide/#creating-a-new-agent
```
Comment for code:
Creating a new ChatGPT agent using the Ollama admin command.

details.content:
docker run -d -v ollama:/root/.ollama -p 11434:11434 --name ollama ollama/ollama
# usage: https://ollama.ai/blog/ollama-is-now-available-as-an-official-docker-image
